column1: forstatement -> FOR NAME TO NUMBER STEP numberParam Scope
forstatement -> FOR varnum TO NUMBER STEP numberParam Scope
forstatement -> FOR NAME TO numberParam  Scope
forstatement -> FOR varnum TO numberParam Scope
incasestatement -> INCASE varbool whenEstatementIncompletebool whenelseestatement ENDINCASE
incasestatement -> INCASE varnum whenEstatementIncompletenum whenelseestatement ENDINCASE
defstatement -> DEF PRINCIPAL LP RP Scope

whenestatement -> WHEN varbool condition boolParam THEN Scope

whenEstatementIncompletenum -> WHEN condition numberParam THEN Scope
